original_title: The Wubbulous World of Dr. Seuss: The Cat's Musical Tales
overview: Dr. Seuss's timeless (and always improbable) universe is filled with wondrous characters who have a knack for teaching important life lessons. That world springs once again to life in this pair of episodes from the live-action television series "The Wubbulous World of Dr. Seuss." Episodes include "The Sounds All Around" and "Horton Has a Hit."
title: The Wubbulous World of Dr. Seuss: The Cat's Musical Tales
